command.name: Read kW Demand, Voltage, Blink Count

cmd.text: getvalue lp channel 1 ?'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm'
getvalue lp channel 2 ?'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm'
getvalue lp channel 3 ?'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm'
getvalue lp channel 4 ?'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm'
